mine-response.name: Spite Launcher
mine-response.result: Create a **hazard (1 point of damage propulsion system)** artificial terrain in base contact with this mech.

smoke-barrage.name: Smoke Barrage
smoke-barrage.result: _Overcharge 1_. Create trhee **smoke** artificial terrain anywhere within range and LoS. Remove them all at the end of the round.

attached-grenade-launcher.name: Attached (Grenade Launcher)
attached-grenade-launcher.desc: Actions printed on this system can only be used from a non-disabled Grenade Launcher system on this mech.

attached-mortar.name: Attached (Mortar)
attached-mortar.desc: Actions printed on this system can only be used from a non-disabled Mortar system on this mech.

on-my-mark.name: On My Mark
on-my-mark.result: All enemy mechs within range gain **marked**.

sonic-shell.name: Sonic Shells
sonic-shell.result: Target takes **three hits**, this action ignores **obscured**.

smoke-grenade.name: Smoke Grenade
smoke-grenade.result: Create a **smoke** artificial terrain anywhere within range and LoS. Remove it at the end of the round.

chaff-cloud.name: Chaff Cloud
chaff-cloud.result: Flip a card for the target and all mechas within 4" of the target, if the flip is ♠ or ♣, that mech gains **Jammed**.
